SEARCH
Package view

Class AppMenus

java.lang.Object
view.AppMenus
public class AppMenus extends Object
The AppMenus class provides methods to display menus and prompt user input for Romas Toy Store application. It contains methods to display main menu, search menu, and prompts for various toy attributes. It also includes methods to display messages for starting and saving the application.

    • removeResults

      public char removeResults(Toy p)
      Prompts the user whether to remove the given toy object and returns the user's response as a character.
      Parameters:
      p - the Toy object to be removed
      Returns:
      'Y' if the user chooses to remove the toy, 'N' otherwise
